name: Skapp
storyline: Skapp brings the latest innovation to the skateboarding genre by using the gyroscope and accelerometer of our smartphones and our gamepad to bring the wildest skateboarding tricks to the palm of your hand! Delve into the Skapp Universe and learn about the secret behind the mystery that lead to all hands revolting and leaving their owners. Perform tricks and grind your way through a compelling story mode or live out your skate dreams for hours in free roam mode!
summary: A skateboarding video game in which you control your board by performing tricks with your phone's gyroscope and your gamepad.
